description: Scrapes content from a given URL
explanation: This plugin takes a URL and optional configuration to scrape specific content from a web page

inputDefinitions.name: url
inputDefinitions.description: The URL to scrape content from

inputDefinitions.name: selector
inputDefinitions.description: CSS selector to target specific elements (optional)

inputDefinitions.name: attribute
inputDefinitions.description: Attribute to extract from the selected elements (optional)

inputDefinitions.name: limit
inputDefinitions.description: Maximum number of results to return (optional)
